lines.gurmukhi: jYsy qau jnnI Kwn pwn kau sMjmu krY qw qy suq rhY inribGn Arog jI
lines.transliteration_english: Jaisay Tau Jananee Khaan Paan Kau Sanjamu Karai , Taa Tay Sout Rahai Nirabighan Arog Jee ?

Shabad OS B.translation: Just as a would-be mother takes care of what she eats so that the child in her womb remains healthy.

lines.gurmukhi: jYsy rwjnIiq rIq ck√çY cyqMn rUp qw qy inhicMq inrBY bsq log jI
lines.transliteration_english: Jaisay Raajaneeti Reet Chakravai Chaytann Roopa , Taa Tay Nihachint Nirabhai Basat Log Jee ?

Shabad OS B.translation: Just as a good ruler remains alert in the enforcement of law and order so as to keep his subjects safe, fearless of any harm and happy.

lines.gurmukhi: jYsy krIAw smuMdR bohQ mY swvDwn qw qy pwir phucq piQk Asog jI
lines.transliteration_english: Jaisay Kareeaa Samoundr Bohad Mai Saavadhaana , Taa Tay Paari Pahouchat Padik Asog Jee ?

Shabad OS B.translation: Just as a sailor is ever alert while sailing his boat in the ocean so that he takes all his passengers safely to other shore.

lines.gurmukhi: qYsy gur pUrn bHm igAwn iDAwn ilv qwN qy inrdoK isK injpd jog jI ]354]
lines.transliteration_english: Taisay Gur Pooran Braham Giaan Dhiaan Liva , Taan Tay Niradokh Sikh Nijapad Jog Jee ?354?

Shabad OS B.translation: Similarly, the God-like True Guru is ever alert to bless his loving and devoted servant with knowledge and ability to focus his mind in Lord's name. And thus a Sikh of the Guru keeps himself free of all vices and becomes eligible for higher spiritual stat
